text:
Hello Aleks,

So sorry for the very late reply. I'll try to reply asap next time. It's just that I'm not getting any notification via email when someone sends me a message on Slack. Overall, I'm doing great for now thank you. It's really hard to get hold of software licences even at our university especially The Foundry Products and Houdini/Arnold. I hope it's not gonna be long till everyone is back working from offices. I'm kind of nervous as well because we're about to graduate and this happens.

I hope you're doing great as well and staying safe :)) Yeah I'm figuring out as well how the companies will continue on the production and thinking there's gonna be a  lot of bottleneck. I just want to see Nolan's TENET! That thing is crazy and I love it :smile: Apparently DNEG is working on it and it would be a bummer if the release date is pushed back and that's quite understandable. Are there any films you're anticipating this coming months?

Also I can't wait for Love + Death + Robots too! One of the reasons why I want to work at those companies like Blur, Axis Studios, Digic Pictures and more! They're really crazy. Since you're working on Advertising, are you interested as well in working on those companies that I mentioned?
